**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 2.0 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- This glass prism pays homage to its namesake pantheon—the [Radiant Prism](/Deities.aspx?ID=380) of [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=292), [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=281), and [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=293). Any armor or weapon the prism is affixed to glows softly with colored lights. The spell DC of any spell cast by activating this item is 35.
  • **Armor** ([light](/Traits.aspx?ID=640)) After you cast a non-cantrip spell by activating the prism, you glow with [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2403) in a multitude of shimmering hues, shedding light like a torch and making you [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) until the end of your next turn.
  • **Weapon** After you cast a non-cantrip spell by activating the prism, your Strikes with the weapon gain the [_brilliant_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2833) property rune until the end of your next turn.
**Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You cast [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171). Radiant Prism **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 2.0 **Price** 8,600 gp --- **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_fiery body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1527). Radiant Prism (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 2.0 **Price** 20,500 gp --- The light and concealment when affixed to armor last for 2 rounds, and the spell DC is 38. The damage from the _brilliant rune_ increases to 2d4 of each type. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast _fiery body._ **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_confusing colors_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1980). Radiant Prism (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 127 2.0 **Price** 64,000 gp --- The light and concealment when affixed to armor last for 2 rounds, and the spell DC is 43. The rune is _greater brilliant_, and its damage is 3d4 of each type. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast _fiery body._ **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_falling stars_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1521).
name: Radiant Prism (Greater)
